title: Can’t Be a Secret
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>I thought it was unusual for you to invite me, Umi, so this is what you’re after, huh….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I heard about it from Eli and Shizuku. They said that it’s like a drinkable cheesecake…. Doesn’t that make you curious!? What kind of thing could that be!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Wouldn’t it be better if you had invited Honoka and Kotori instead<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>….I strictly told both of them to not drink or eat too much before, so it’s a little bit hard to say….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>That’s why you invited me instead!? Geez…. *slurp*.... My, the tastes aren’t quite like I expected…. Try it too, Umi<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>*slurp*.... This is…. delicious….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Hey, we can’t just enjoy this ourselves. Bring Honoka and Kotori here, Umi. I’ll bring Rin and Hanayo, so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Speaking of which, Eli said that she bought takeaways for Nico and Nozomi…. Certainly, this is something you want to drink with everyone, isn’t it….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Fufu. If it’s like this, it would’ve been better if we came here with everyone from the start<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Fufu, that’s true. From now on, I won’t hold myself back from inviting people too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
